Please fill out the sections below... thank you --> ### Issue Summary Hi, We are getting following error: "Operation cannot be paginated: get_tables" While hitting api/data_sources/n/schema endpoint. After https://github.com/getredash/redash/commit/dceb58cd79651dc6a6d7cbe5ad63649fdbdead38#commitcomment-28080004 was introdused The reason for the issue is the outdated version of botocore in requirements_all_ds.txt (1.8.6) After changing it to botocore==1.8.35 the issue disappears. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Configure Athena datasource with Glue Metastore 2. Create a new query - error appears while redash gets list oftables ### Technical details: * Redash Version: Redash 4.0.0-rc.1 * Browser/OS: * How did you install Redash: docker Kind regards, Ievgen.
